product_name: Zojirushi SlickSteel Stainless-Steel Vacuum Mug - 12 fl. oz.
long_description: The 12 fl. oz. Zojirushi SlickSteel(TM) Stainless-Steel vacuum mug keeps your drink hot or cold for hours, and features a clean, uncoated interior that won't corrode or stain. Durable, food-grade 18/8 stainless-steel interior with SlickSteel polishing is smooth, clean and corrision resistant. Flip-open lid is easy to operate and allows quick access to your beverage; locking switch prevents the lid from opening accidentally. Tight-fitting lid keeps beverages hotter or colder than other traditional travel mugs. Compact design takes up minimal space in your backpack; fits in most vehicle cup holders. Stopper in the lid prevents leaks and disassembles for easy cleaning. Zojirushi SlickSteel(TM) Stainless-Steel vacuum mug has a wide-mouth opening that accepts full-size ice cubes.
short_description: The 12 fl. oz. Zojirushi SlickSteel(TM) Stainless-Steel vacuum mug keeps your drink hot or cold for hours, and features a clean, uncoated interior that won't corrode or stain.
